value.name: Walt Whitman's birthday honoured with walk and poetry
value.description: Architectural draughtsman James William Wallace established the Eagle Street College, an informal literary society, at his home in Eagle Street, Bolton in 1885. The group became devoted to Whitman ...

value.name: How Bolton marks its unique bond with Great American poet Walt Whitman
value.description: This was the site of the home of architectural draughtsman James William Wallace. It was dubbed the Eagle Street College on acount of the fact that this was where the ‘Whitmanites’ first met ...
